wc.title: Warp Calculator
wc.desc: Calculate the amount of warps needed to hit your next soft or hard pity. Includes the option to switch between Character and Light Cone banners.

wh.title: Warp History
wh.desc: Import your warp history to view your latest and previous pulls for Character, Light Cone, and Regular banners.
wh.intro:
Track the amount of warps you've made, and how
many are needed until your next 5 star.
wh.tips: The following page has yet to been optimised for smaller screen devices/windows.,The following page still has features in-development.
wh.emptyDataHint: Click the import button to start.

import.title: Import Warps
import.desc:
Follow the steps below to import your warp history
from Honkai: Star Rail.
import.step1: Open Honkai: Star Rail on PC.
import.step2: Open your Warp History and go to the Records tab.
import.step3: Open Windows PowerShell and paste the following command.

step4.title: Paste the URL that was copied into the box below.

importing.title: Importing...
importing.hint: Please be patient, this may take awhile.
